review.reviewBody: Exactly what we were craving - packed the udon broth and udon noodles separately which was really appreciated.

I've ordered from this restaurant a few times and the food is good. tonight I ordered 186. Beef with Black Bean Sauce Chow Mein  and was shocked at how little beef was on the dish this time. It felt like I spent $20+ dollars on chow mein with black bean sauce. not sure if this was a one off thing or if this is their idea of shrinkflation but I'm not sure I'm reordering again.

The chicken fried rice was fine, but nothing out of the ordinary. But unfortunately the chow mein I ordered arrived half way overcooked with super dry, hard, crispy noodles and even with some noodles burnt, and the other half was so soggy and mushy it was very unappetizing.

The 232. Shredded Chicken Fried Rice was pretty standard and was fine. But half the 194. Shredded Chicken Chow Mein noodles were dry/crunchy and burned in some places and the other half was soggy and mushy, and not at all appealing unfortunately.

Spicy Silverfish overcooked and tasted like fried dough. fish maw soup 23 DOLLARS FOR A SMALL?!?! i know iwnas getting scammed but not like THAT scammed lol.
lol anyways any other standard order is fine.
